channel.title: Commands
channel.description:
hey, I got some commands I need some help adding.. my source is MTP v2...
I want to add commands like: ::rules ::jail ::vent (one that makes other players say things) and ::commands but only mods and staff can use the ::commands cause only staff CAN use commands... how can I add these?
I am not a coder I only know these things: how to change weapon stats
change ip itemspawn commands mute ban lol
anyway any help is great!
also i want to add customs but the client doesn't have a model folder nor does it have a class8.java...
how can i fix this/add customs?

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @deathe1000 deathe1000
item.description:
@deathe1000 wrote:

hey, I got some commands I need some help adding… my source is MTP v2…

I want to add commands like:
::rules
::jail
::vent (one that makes other players say things)
and ::commands but only mods and staff can use the ::commands cause only staff CAN use commands… how can I add these?

I am not a coder I only know these things:
how to change weapon stats

change ip
itemspawn commands
mute
ban lol

anyway any help is great!

also i want to add customs but the client doesn’t have a model folder nor does it have a class8.java…

how can i fix this/add customs?
